name: Deep Space Distress - Updated
description:
Pulled into a mysterious growing space anomaly, your only chance to survive is to re-enter the vortex and risk going deeper and deeper into dangerous unknown space, hoping to eventually arrive somewhere safe.

The ship is controlled using the mouse. Left click to shift power from weapons to thrusters. You must choose to either accelerate, or fire your weapons, but you cannot do both at the same time.

In order to advance to the next stage, you must survive long enough for the vortex to grow large enough to envelop your ship and take you to the next stage.

Created By: EPriest
Music By: DOS-88
